---
title: "Evan Odell's CV"
author: Evan Odell
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: false
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'resume.css']
    self_contained: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VtkzCbTrDlVtoNdpSmAyqZl6R-CnLfilRcbNd_v5k2I/edit?usp=sharing"
)

```

```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```


Aside
================================================================================

```{r}
# Build interactive network of positions colored by section
# and connected if they occurred in the same year
# fix this to make it more sensible, link related projects

datadrivencv::build_network_logo(CV$entries_data)
```


```{r}
if(params$pdf_mode){
  cat("View this CV online at _evanodell.com/cv/_")
} else {
  cat("[<i class='fas fa-download'></i> Download a PDF of this CV](https://github.com/evanodell/cv/raw/master/evanodell_cv.pdf)")
}
```
